title: 2009년 Wicker 사건

description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: Travis WICKER, Appellant, v. STATE of Mississippi, Appellee
**판결일**: 2009-02-10
**법원**: Court of Appeals of Mississippi
**관할**: Mississippi, MS

**판사**: Barnes, Carlton, Griffis, Irving, Ishee, King, Lee, Myers, Roberts

## 변호인

Travis Wicker (pro se), appellant., Office of the Attorney General by W. Glenn Watts, attorney for appellee.

## 인용

- 16 So. 3d 706

## 판결문 요약


16 So. 3d 706 (2009)
Travis WICKER, Appellant,
v.
STATE of Mississippi, Appellee.
No. 2008-CP-01078-COA.
Court of Appeals of Mississippi.
February 10, 2009.
Rehearing Denied June 9, 2009.
Certiorari Denied September 3, 2009.
*707 Travis Wicker (pro se), appellant.
Office of the Attorney General by W. Glenn Watts, attorney for appellee.
Before LEE, P.J., GRIFFIS and BARNES, JJ.
LEE, P.J., for the Court.

FACTS AND PROCEDURAL HISTORY
¶ 1. On November 30, 1995, in the Rankin County Circuit Court, Travis Wicker pleaded guilty to murder and two counts of aggravated assault. Wicker was sentenced to a life sentence for the murder charge and twenty years for each aggravated assault charge. All sentences were to be served consecutively in the custody of the Mississippi Department of Corrections.
¶ 2. On July 26, 2007, Wicker filed a motion to vacate his sentence. The trial court denied Wicker's motion, finding that it was procedurally barred and, regardless of the procedural bar, without merit. Wicker now appeals, asserting the following: (1) his right against double jeopardy was violated; (2) his indictment was defective; (3) his trial counsel was ineffective; and (4) the trial court erred in finding his motion for relief was time-barred. Finding no merit, we affirm.

STANDARD OF REVIEW
¶ 3. A trial court's denial of post-conviction relief will not be reversed absent a finding that the trial court's decision was clearly erroneous. Smith v. State, 806 So. 2d 1148, 1150(¶ 3) (Miss.Ct....
